scripts.setup: npm install && npm run cli:build && ./bloud setup
scripts.test:go: cd services/host-agent && go run gotest.tools/gotestsum@latest --format testdox ./...
scripts.test:go:apps: cd apps && go run gotest.tools/gotestsum@latest --format testdox ./...
scripts.test:go:all: npm run test:go && npm run test:go:apps
scripts.test:go:coverage: cd services/host-agent && go test -coverprofile=coverage.out ./... && go tool cover -func=coverage.out | tail -1
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:go:all && npm run test:ts
scripts.test:precommit: npm run test:go:all && npm run test:ts
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:nix && npm run test:integration
